titles: The relaps'd apostate, or, Notes upon a Presbyterian pamphlet, entituled, A petition for peace, &c. wherein the faction and design are laid as open as heart can wish by Roger L'Estrange.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Petition for peace with the reformation of the liturgy, &c.
